headline: In the Kingdom of Kitchens, an Avocado-Green Uprising
abstract: The days of the all-white kitchen and plain stainless-steel appliances may be numbered.
lead_paragraph: Remember your grandmother’s avocado-green kitchen? It could soon be yours. Or maybe it’ll be pink, mauve, emerald green or buttercup. Anything but white, because the revolt against the white kitchen has begun.
